scripts.copyStatic: cp index.html dist/index.html && cp css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bootstrap.min.css
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/js && mkdir dist/css
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copyStatic && watchify js/index.js -o dist/js/bundle.js -dv -t babelify
scripts.test: npm run clean && browserify -t babelify js/test/test.js| node
